document_data.name: Freona
document_data.mainbody: '''Madame Freona''' was a [[halfling]] businesswoman in [[Phlan]].{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|4}}
document_data.Personality: Freona had a keen taste for the finer things in life. She was a good cook, a terrible gossip hound, and a very skilled entrepreneur. She loved her city and hated the [[dragon]] usurper.{{Cite adventurers league/Escape from Phlan|12}}
document_data.Activities: Freona managed the [[Madame Freona's Tea Kettle]] tea house with the help of her daughters Reece, Briez, Grelinda, Blaizette and Whittlee.
